hankyung_klaytn_account_create.queryString: INSERT INTO hankyung_klaytn_account (accnt_id, name, address) VALUES (?, ?, ?)

hankyung_klaytn_account_name_update.queryString: UPDATE hankyung_klaytn_account SET name = ? WHERE accnt_id = ?

service_group_get_in_id.queryString: SELECT * FROM service_group WHERE svc_grp_id IN (?)

service_group_name_update.queryString: UPDATE service_group SET name = ? WHERE svc_grp_id = ?

service_group_apikey_update.queryString: UPDATE service_group SET api_key_id = ?, api_key_value = ? WHERE svc_grp_id = ?

service_group_pending_apikey_update.queryString: UPDATE service_group SET pending_api_key_id = ?, pending_api_key_value = ? WHERE svc_grp_id = ?

service_group_create.queryString: INSERT INTO service_group (svc_grp_id, name, accnt_id, api_key_id, api_key_value) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ? , ?)

service_get_list.queryString: SELECT * FROM service WHERE svc_grp_id IN (?) ORDER BY svc_num ASC LIMIT ?, ?;

service_get_total_count.queryString: SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM service WHERE svc_grp_id IN (?);

service_info_update.queryString: UPDATE service SET name = ?, description = ?  WHERE svc_num = ?

service_create.queryString: INSERT INTO service (svc_grp_id, name, description , mbr_grp_id, reg_dt) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, now() )

transfer_get_list_by_user.queryString: SELECT t.*, s.name as svc_name, s.description as svc_desc,sg.name as svc_grp_name, el.type as log_type, el.code as log_code, el.message as log_message FROM transfer t LEFT OUTER JOIN error_log el on t.log_seq = el.log_seq INNER JOIN link l ON l.mbr_grp_id= ? AND l.mbr_id= ? INNER JOIN shift.service s ON t.svc_num = s.svc_num INNER JOIN shift.service_group sg ON sg.svc_grp_id = s.svc_grp_id WHERE t.link_num=l.link_num AND t.transfer_reg_dt BETWEEN ? AND ? AND t.type IN (?) ORDER BY t.transfer_reg_dt DESC LIMIT ?, ?;

transfer_get_total_count_by_user.queryString: SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM transfer t INNER JOIN link l ON l.mbr_grp_id= ? AND l.mbr_id= ? WHERE t.link_num=l.link_num AND t.transfer_reg_dt BETWEEN ? AND ? AND t.type IN (?);

transfer_get_list_by_user_service.queryString: SELECT t.*, s.name as svc_name, s.description as svc_desc,sg.name as svc_grp_name, el.type as log_type, el.code as log_code, el.message as log_message FROM transfer t LEFT OUTER JOIN error_log el on t.log_seq = el.log_seq INNER JOIN link l ON l.mbr_grp_id= ? AND l.mbr_id= ? INNER JOIN shift.service s ON t.svc_num = s.svc_num INNER JOIN shift.service_group sg ON sg.svc_grp_id = s.svc_grp_id WHERE t.link_num=l.link_num AND t.svc_num= ? AND t.transfer_reg_dt BETWEEN ? AND ? AND t.type IN (?) ORDER BY t.transfer_reg_dt DESC LIMIT ?, ?;
transfer_get_list_by_user_service.desc: transfer get list by user where svc_num

transfer_get_total_count_by_user_service.queryString: SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM transfer t INNER JOIN link l ON l.mbr_grp_id= ? AND l.mbr_id= ? WHERE t.link_num=l.link_num AND t.svc_num= ? AND t.transfer_reg_dt BETWEEN ? AND ? AND t.type IN (?);

AND l.mbr_id= ? INNER JOIN service s ON s.svc_grp_id IN (?) INNER JOIN shift.service_group sg ON sg.svc_grp_id = s.svc_grp_id WHERE t.link_num=l.link_num AND t.svc_num=s.svc_num AND t.transfer_reg_dt BETWEEN ? AND ? AND t.type IN (?) ORDER BY t.transfer_reg_dt DESC LIMIT ?, ?;

transfer_get_list_by_service.queryString: SELECT t.*, s.name as svc_name, s.description as svc_desc,sg.name as svc_grp_name, el.type as log_type, el.code as log_code, el.message as log_message FROM transfer t LEFT OUTER JOIN error_log el on t.log_seq = el.log_seq INNER JOIN link l ON l.link_num=t.link_num INNER JOIN service s ON s.svc_num=t.svc_num INNER JOIN shift.service_group sg ON sg.svc_grp_id = s.svc_grp_id WHERE s.svc_num=? transfer_get_list_by_service_group.queryString: SELECT t.*, s.name as svc_name, s.description as svc_desc,sg.name as svc_grp_name, el.type as log_type, el.code as log_code, el.message as log_message FROM transfer t LEFT OUTER JOIN error_log el on t.log_seq = el.log_seq INNER JOIN link l ON l.link_num=t.link_num INNER JOIN service s ON s.svc_grp_id IN (?) INNER JOIN service_group sg ON sg.svc_grp_id=s.svc_grp_id WHERE t.svc_num=s.svc_num AND t.type IN (?) AND t.transfer_reg_dt BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY t.transfer_reg_dt DESC LIMIT ?, ?;

INNER JOIN service_group sg ON sg.svc_grp_id=s.svc_grp_id WHERE t.svc_num=s.svc_num AND t.type IN (?) AND t.transfer_reg_dt BETWEEN ? AND ?;

reward_get_list_by_user.queryString: SELECT rq.*, s.name as svc_name, s.description as svc_desc FROM reward_queue rq INNER JOIN link l ON l.mbr_id=rq.mbr_id AND l.mbr_grp_id=rq.mbr_grp_id INNER JOIN service s ON s.svc_num = rq.svc_num WHERE rq.mbr_id=? AND rq.mbr_grp_id=? AND rq.job_status IN ('ready','fetched') LIMIT ?, ?;

reward_get_total_count_by_user.queryString: SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM reward_queue rq INNER JOIN link l ON l.mbr_id=rq.mbr_id AND l.mbr_grp_id=rq.mbr_grp_id INNER JOIN service s ON s.svc_num = rq.svc_num WHERE rq.mbr_id=? AND rq.mbr_grp_id=? AND rq.job_status IN ('ready','fetched');

WHERE rq.mbr_id=? AND rq.mbr_grp_id=? AND rq.job_status IN ('ready','fetched') LIMIT ?, ?;

link_get_list_date_range.queryString: SELECT l.*, s.name as svc_name, s.description as svc_desc, sg.name as sg_name from link l LEFT OUTER JOIN service s ON l.svc_id = s.svc_num LEFT OUTER JOIN service_group sg ON l.svc_grp_id = sg.svc_grp_id WHERE l.reg_dt BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY reg_dt DESC LIMIT ?, ?;

link_get_total_count_date_range.queryString: SELECT COUNT(*) as total from link l LEFT OUTER JOIN service s ON l.svc_id = s.svc_num LEFT OUTER JOIN service_group sg ON l.svc_grp_id = sg.svc_grp_id WHERE l.reg_dt BETWEEN ? AND ?

link_get_info_user.queryString: SELECT l.*, s.name as svc_name, s.description as svc_desc, sg.name as sg_name from link l LEFT OUTER JOIN service s ON l.svc_id = s.svc_num LEFT OUTER JOIN service_group sg ON l.svc_grp_id = sg.svc_grp_id WHERE l.mbr_grp_id = ? AND l.mbr_id = ?

link_temp_get_list_user.queryString: SELECT l.*, s.name as svc_name, s.description as svc_desc, sg.name as sg_name FROM link_temp l LEFT OUTER JOIN service s ON l.svc_id = s.svc_num LEFT OUTER JOIN service_group sg ON l.svc_grp_id = sg.svc_grp_id WHERE l.mbr_id = ? AND l.mbr_grp_id = ? ORDER BY reg_dt DESC LIMIT ?, ?;

link_temp_get_total_count_user.queryString: SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM link_temp l LEFT OUTER JOIN service s ON l.svc_id = s.svc_num LEFT OUTER JOIN service_group sg ON l.svc_grp_id = sg.svc_grp_id WHERE l.mbr_id = ? AND l.mbr_grp_id = ?

bulk_transfer_create.queryString: INSERT INTO bulk_transfer (svc_num, admin_id, fixed_amount, total_count, success_count, total_amount, reg_dt, reserve_dt, expire_dt, link_check, memo) VALUES (?,?,?,?,0,?,now(),?,?,?,?)

reward_que_insert_bulk.desc: promise reward 큐 생성 - with bulk_seq

check_hk_klayton.queryString: SELECT * FROM hankyung_klaytn_account WHERE accnt_id = (SELECT accnt_id FROM service_group WHERE svc_grp_id = (SELECT svc_grp_id FROM service WHERE svc_num = ? ))
check_hk_klayton.desc: 해당 serviceNumber 한경 클레이튼 계정 확인

bulk_transfer_get_list.queryString: SELECT b.*, s.name as svc_name, s.description as svc_desc, s.mbr_grp_id as svc_mbr_grp_id FROM bulk_transfer b INNER JOIN service s ON s.svc_num = b.svc_num WHERE b.reg_dt BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY b.reg_dt DESC LIMIT ?, ?

bulk_transfer_get_total_count.queryString: SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM bulk_transfer b INNER JOIN service s ON s.svc_num = b.svc_num WHERE b.reg_dt BETWEEN ? AND ?

bulk_transfer_get_list_by_service.queryString: SELECT b.*, s.name as svc_name, s.description as svc_desc, s.mbr_grp_id as svc_mbr_grp_id FROM bulk_transfer b INNER JOIN service s ON s.svc_num = b.svc_num WHERE b.svc_num = ? AND b.reg_dt BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY b.reg_dt DESC LIMIT ?, ?

bulk_transfer_get_total_count_by_service.queryString: SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM bulk_transfer b INNER JOIN service s ON s.svc_num = b.svc_num WHERE b.svc_num = ? AND b.reg_dt BETWEEN ? AND ?
bulk_transfer_get_total_count_by_service.desc: bulk transfer total count where service

bulk_transfer_get_list_by_admin_id.queryString: SELECT b.*, s.name as svc_name, s.description as svc_desc, s.mbr_grp_id as svc_mbr_grp_id FROM bulk_transfer b INNER JOIN service s ON s.svc_num = b.svc_num WHERE b.admin_id = ? AND b.reg_dt BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY b.reg_dt DESC LIMIT ?, ?

bulk_transfer_get_total_count_by_admin_i.queryString: SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM bulk_transfer b INNER JOIN service s ON s.svc_num = b.svc_num WHERE b.admin_id = ? AND b.reg_dt BETWEEN ? AND ?
bulk_transfer_get_total_count_by_admin_i.desc: bulk transfer total count where admin_id

bulk_transfer_get.queryString: SELECT * FROM bulk_transfer b INNER JOIN service s ON b.svc_num = s.svc_num WHERE b.bulk_seq = ?

bulk_transfer_get_detail_list.queryString: SELECT r.*, t.transfer_seq,t.tx_status, t.job_status as tx_job_status, t.tx_hash, t.transfer_reg_dt, t.transfer_end_dt, t.fee, t.amount as transfer_amount ,l.log_seq as r_log_seq, l.type as r_log_type, l.code as r_log_code, l.message as r_log_message, lt.log_seq as t_log_seq, lt.type as t_log_type, lt.code as t_log_code, lt.message as t_log_message  FROM reward_queue r LEFT OUTER JOIN transfer t ON r.transfer_seq = t.transfer_seq  LEFT OUTER JOIN error_log l ON r.log_seq = l.log_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN error_log lt ON t.log_seq = lt.log_seq WHERE r.bulk_seq = ? AND r.job_status IN (?) LIMIT ?, ?
bulk_transfer_get_detail_list.desc: bulk transfer get list transfer & reward queue

bulk_transfer_get_total_count_detail_lis.queryString: SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM reward_queue r LEFT OUTER JOIN transfer t ON r.transfer_seq = t.transfer_seq WHERE r.bulk_seq = ? AND r.job_status IN (?)
bulk_transfer_get_total_count_detail_lis.desc: bulk transfer get list transfer & reward queue

bulk_transfer_get_detail_status_count.queryString: SELECT distinct(job_status) as status, COUNT(*) as count FROM reward_queue WHERE bulk_seq = ?
bulk_transfer_get_detail_status_count.desc: bulk transfer get reward queue status count

backoffice_part_get.queryString: SELECT * FROM backoffice_part ORDER BY parent_part_seq, part_order

admin_insert.queryString: INSERT INTO admin (admin_id, email, name, company) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)

admin_backoffice_part_auth_insert.queryString: INSERT INTO admin_backoffice_part_auth(admin_id, auth_type, part_seq) VALUES ?

admin_backoffice_part_auth_get_by_admin_.queryString: SELECT b.part_seq as part_seq, name, url, part_type, parent_part_seq, part_order, auth_type FROM backoffice_part as b LEFT OUTER JOIN admin_backoffice_part_auth a on b.part_seq = a.part_seq AND a.admin_id = ? ORDER BY parent_part_seq, part_order

admin_service_group_auth_get_by_admin_id.desc: admin user service group auth info

admin_update.queryString: UPDATE admin SET name = ?, company=? WHERE admin_id = ?

admin_service_group_auth_update.queryString: UPDATE admin_service_group_auth SET auth_list = ? WHERE admin_id = ?

admin_action_log_insert.queryString: INSERT INTO admin_action_log (admin_id, method, path, data, log_dt) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, now())

admin_action_log_list.queryString: SELECT * FROM admin_action_log l INNER JOIN admin a ON l.admin_id = a.admin_id WHERE l.admin_id IN (?) AND log_dt BETWEEN ? AND ?  ORDER BY log_dt DESC LIMIT ?, ?

admin_action_total_count.queryString: SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM admin_action_log WHERE admin_id IN (?) AND log_dt BETWEEN ? AND ?
